name: Miles4Smiles
description: React Application that allows runners to connect, compete and create challenges that lead to donations to local businesses in their area.

name: Spaced Repetition Quiz
description: Coding quiz based on spaced repetition algorithm allowing users to get focus more on harder concepts by getting more time if they answer the questions wrong.

name: Code Query
description: 'Cody Query' is an application that allows bootcamp students to ask and manage questions and answers. The users connected can communicate in real-time.

name: Employee Manager
description: This is a CLI application that lets one to view and manage the departments, roles, and employees.

name: Workout Logger
description: Workout tracker app helps one to view, create and track daily workouts. The user can log multiple exercises in a workout on a given day.

name: Weather App
description: The weather application comes with search functionality to find current weather conditions and the future weather outlook for multiple cities.
